skills.name: Protective Field
skills.description: [SP: 5][CD: 20s] Creates a shield that absorbs 12% Max HP of wielder when hit by enemy attack. While the shield stands, wielder heals 22.0 HP/s and ATKs gain 10.0% Total DMG Multiplier and deal 10% more Physical DMG. Duration: 10s.

skills.name: Vitality Drive
skills.description: Gains a 1.20% Total DMG Multiplier and 0.50% Physical DMG buff per 10% HP that the wielder has.
